pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, January 14, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

Montréal, Quebec

The Prime Minister will make a shiva call to offer his condolences to the family of former Senator E. Leo Kolber.

Closed to media.

The Prime Minister will meet with family members of the victims of the Flight PS752 tragedy.

Closed to media.
